title: Ledger Event — Lens Invocation
description: Ledger entry for each lens.* invocation, recording payload, result, and surfacing context.

id.description: Stable event identifier for this ledger entry.

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp when the lens call was made.

compound_id.description: If part of a compound lens execution, record the compound id.

payload.description: Validated payload passed to the lens.

result.description: Emission returned by the router for this lens.

ok.description: Quick flag for whether the lens call succeeded.

surface_block.description: Exact text block surfaced to the user (the [LENS: …] header + payload/result summary).
